body.name: BOBLOV KJ21 256GB Body Camera, 1296P Support 8-10hours Recording, Expand Memory, Night Vision and Easy to Operate, for Daily Shooting or Evidence Collection
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 12 hrs 43 mins
features: 【Multi-functional Body Worn Camera】The body worn camera for law enforcement is easy to use and configure, features with Pre-record, Post-record, Edit Device ID, File Protection, etc; Ideal for security guard, police officer and bouncer for indoor and heaby-duty outdoor use.

【Powerful Auto/Manual IR Night Vision 】 This body camera with 140° wide angle captures 1296P HD videos; Meanwhile, it equipped with High-Intensity infrared LEDs, can capture clear footage up to 10m/32ft feet away in pitch-black darkness.

【Audio &Video Recording With External Storage】 Body wearable camera with audio recording adopts external micro SD card storage, provides you flexible memory ; Supports external mirco SD cards up to 256G

【Large Battery Capacity & Longer Video Fragments】 The video recorder comes with built-in a 2850 mAh rechargeable battery that lasts for 9~10 Hours of recording time in 1080P, Screen&IR off. KJ21 allows you recording a video which lenth is up to 30 mins, easy to view.

【 Lightweight & 360° Rotate Clips】 Personal surveillance camera with Lightweight and compact is equipped with two stable 360° rotation clips, fits to clip on shoulder straps of backpack or on polo shirt or on belt. In addition, security body cam also can be set to work as a dash camera for your vehicle.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Built-in 2850mAh battery, supports over 10 hours of recording.Features 1296P high definition, the video with audio recording is clear.With 360° rotatable short back clip and 180° rotatable long back clip, it's suitable for different application scenes.

Built-in a 2850 mAh rechargeable battery. Thanks to its power-saving technology, the device gives more than 10 hours of recording time(in 1080p, screen off) Charging takes only 4 hours, easy to keep sufficient power. The default is off of night vision, long pressing the "White Light" Button of the body camera could activate it, and 6pcs IR lights would turn on. The image turns to black and white. If need the camera to switch night vision automatically, enter the menu to set IR Filter to "Auto". The device allows you to record an extra 15-second video before the recording start and an extra 5 minutes(max) after the recording stops. We optimized the menu and button operation logic to ensure the device is more convenient to use.

Note Please: 1, When charging the battery, please turn off the camera for charging. Charging time will be faster and also protect the battery. 2, If the clips are broken by accident while using the camera, you can get the new clip by write to us.

In the menu, if you set the password on. Then the password is needed when you want to view files on the computer by connecting the camera to the computer. Protect your files to prevent being viewed by others. If you set Car Dash Cam Mode to ON, the device will start recording automatically when connecting to an USB power supply. Built-in 6 pcs infrared lights, gives clear night view. KJ21 improved video segmentation and storage. It allows you to capture videos up to 30 minutes in length. Usually, a longer video is more suitable for evidence collection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Camera for the price.
reviews.reviewText: Couple of things if you are wary of purchasing this camera.If you are looking for something that is going to be functional and useful, BUY ITif you want a camera which can switch from night vision to regular automatically, BUY ITif you want a camera that has several different mounting options, see what this unit offers before you commit.I use this camera for my job, at night, driving for 4ish hours. it works perfectly for this.Pros:Great night visionGreat 720p, 1080p and 1296p video quality (30fps)Long lasting batteryMenu system is easy to navigate and understandOnce card is formatted on unit, you can use it on your PC to watch/copy/archiveCan use up to a 128gb micro SD card (Sold Separately)Nice heft to the unit, doesn't feel cheaply made.Support is polite and generally helpfulCons: (some are only personal preferences)To charge, it uses mini USB, older interface, older cords, not available everywhere.Night vision coming on makes a distinct click sound, which seems to be mechanical switching of lensesNight vision cannot control rather the IR LED are lit or not (shortens battery length)Limited mounts, comes with an epaulet/belt clip and a shorter clip on clipNo other mounts available for the unit that I have been able to findCompany in China, so, Support is delayed unless you are awake at night.Like I said before, some are just personal preferences, BUT...I highly recommend this unit if it fits your needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little device.
reviews.reviewText: I often at times do not get the opportunity to write reviews, especially this soon after I have made a purchase, but felt compelled to write a review about this great little device. When I researched tools to guard or to aid in protecting your safety, I came across this. I had already been aware of these devices being used by law enforcement, but was not aware that they were available for civilians as well. I wanted to be for certain prior to buying one, so I searched through some of the reviews and found that they are not only for those individuals but anyone, and are being used for the same purpose I have in mind. Being a woman and concerned for my safety, especially during these times and with also having had many, many matters to occur in the past with traveling alone, exercising, going about running errands and minding my own business will serve as a great tool to aid in addition to other devices and/or tools I have such as mace, stun gun, etc., in keeping me safe and protected from uncomfortable/threatening situations, trouble makers and dishonest people.I know a lot of people have in mind, well why not just use your phone to record if you feel threatened or unsafe? Not often at times this is an option, especially if you do not have the time to find your phone or have it handy in a threatening or uncomfortable encounter. This recording device is made specifically to securely wear on your person without being easily removed and also creates less of a hassle if you have to be hands free to defend yourself or immediately leave an unsafe situation while keeping track of anything that is going on or has taken place. I tested it out and it works very well. It has a lot of great features.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good body camera with descent image
reviews.reviewText: Bought the body cam as I work in the Armed security industry want it to have something to keep record of my altercation with ....m you knowIt's a nice camera for the price it charges up quick and hold battery charge for few days if you didn't keep the camera on all day just turn it on when you about to go talk to someoneThe resolution of the camera is nice decent crisp nice imageAlso budget friendly and quality product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as Advertised, And Customer Services Rocks!
reviews.reviewText: This is an updated review from my first review that was a 1-start ONLY because the device didn't work due to memory card defect. However, upon connecting with customer support about the issue, they quickly sent me a replacement device and that one worked as advertised. I tested the device from full charge, running non-stop video/audio, until full dead. I checked the video quality and audio quality. Here are my results. Video is about as best you can do for 1080p. For accountability in assisted living situations, like mine, it records everything no problem. For an impressive 10 hours, 25 minutes before dying. The software automatically increments the breakpoints at around 1.2gb per file. Total of about 40gb per 10 hours, 25 mins. The audio is good for other people. For the person wearing, its almost over modulated due to mic sensitivity. So no need to wear it close to neck. Maybe mid chest is good enough. Plug in to computer to pull files. They read well. But biggest plus is customer service. Having a product like this, you want someone to be able to replace if you need to submit warranty issue especially in assisted living. we dont have time for delays, so i appreciate them being on top of things. So, i updated my review to 5 star mostly due to customer service, and of course the device does work as advertised.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good body camera/bicycle dash cam
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a 'dash cam' for when I ride my bicycle. I mounted one of the Boblov clips to the front of my helmet with velcro and zip ties, and it works GREAT for bicycling and taking video for bicycling! I'm sure there are a lot of good ways to mount it, but this method was pretty good for stabilizing the video (as opposed to clipping to your shirt and riding). Most of the time, I'm able to make out license plates. I usually run it on 720p. Battery life is good and usually last several hours. Recordings at night are a tad less clear, but still very good. I think this is an excellent cheaper alternative for a monitoring camera for bicycling. The video loop records and retains several trips worth of footage. It records over old video when it fills up. It has a wide angle/view (kind of like fish eye, but not quite). It is an excellent camera.
Ni utiliza SD card, usa TF card, deberían actualizar la información para describir el articulo

reviews.reviewTitle: I feel safe wearing this. This is a picture of the screen. It's crystal clear when viewing
reviews.reviewText: I bought this camera for my own safety. I was accused of made up lies that never happened.So I felt unsafe, feared a couple in my building.Works great! Even solved a crime on it that the police detectives took.They were able to make out the make and model of the vehicle, drivers license plate, etc.The only issue is I Don't have a computer to delete old files so they stay on even when I manually delete them on the camera.That in which I wasn't too happy about..
This body camera helps when driving my scooter, you caught people you drive recluse, my safety comes first when it come to driving a motorcycle (scooter).
È stata restituita nel mio caso perché per quello che la devo utilizzare mi sembra dedicata, ne cercherò una più robusta in caso di urti

reviews.reviewTitle: Reliable bodycam at a good price.
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this bodycam for our motor assessor to record insurance assessments. So far it seems like a good product that represents good value.
